Standard banner productfeed (banner).description: simple productfeed banner markup with an image

body: <rlc_productfeed template="basicprod" cachetime="15" pid="$000" custom1="" custom2="{{IMG_PATH}}" custom3="{{IMG_PATH}}" custom4="{{ALT}}" custom5="" >

custom JS file.description: custom JS file with blank path

creative fonts FONT file.description: creative font CSS file (Didot, Sackers, Garamond, Futura, SnellRoundhand, Univers, Fenice, Rockwell, Shelley, Engravers)

body: <article id="rlc-$id" class="rlc-fullbleed rlc-block rlc-lazyLoad rlc-cardstack rlc-hasarrows rlc-hasbuttons">
/* NOTE: The height is set on .rlc-slidewrapper. */
<div class="rlc-slide rlc-block rlc-slide3 rlc-lazyLoad rlc-ll_manual" data-duration="10">
<style type="text/css" content="general mens polo page styles 2024">
<style type="text/css" content="general purple label page styles 2024">
--foundersReg: "Founders Grotesk text Regular", "Times New Roman", Times, serif;
font-family: RL_DroidKufi, Founders Grotesk text Regular, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif !important;
<style type="text/css" content="general womens polo page styles 2024">
content: "- DEV in progress - Please do not raise UAT issues on this slot until this tag is removed -";
Dev in progress tag.description: Add Dev in progress tag - UAT teams know element is being worked on (REMOVE after fixes are implemented)

body: <section id="rlc-$id" class="rlc-creative_v3 rlc-block rlc-lazyLoad rlc-1440_375_max1920 rlc-all-text-center {{LANG}}">
